      • builderBody

        public AppPayParamChain builderBody(String body)
        A Specific Description Of A Transaction. If There Are Multiple Products, Please Add Up The Product Description String And Pass It To The Body.

        对一笔交易的具体描述信息.如果是多种商品,请将商品描述字符串累加传给body.

        参数:
        body - body
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderSubject

        public AppPayParamChain builderSubject(String subject)
        !!This Is An Indispensable Parameter Product Title / Transaction Title / Order Title / Order Keyword, Etc

        !!这是不可缺参数 商品的标题/交易标题/订单标题/订单关键字等

        参数:
        subject - subject
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderOutTradeNo

        public AppPayParamChain builderOutTradeNo(String outTradeNo)
        !!This Is An Indispensable Parameter Unique Order Number Of Merchant Website

        !!这是不可缺参数 商户网站唯一订单号

        参数:
        outTradeNo - outTradeNo
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderTimeoutExpress

        public AppPayParamChain builderTimeoutExpress(String timeoutExpress)
        The Latest Payment Time Allowed For This Order. If Overdue, The Transaction Will Be Closed. Value Range: 1m-15d. M-minute, H-Hour, D-Day, 1c day (In The Case Of 1C Day, No Matter When The Transaction Is Created, It Is Closed At 0:00). This Parameter Value Does Not Accept Decimal Point, Such As 1.5h, Which Can Be Converted To 90m. Note: If It Is Blank, It Defaults To 15d.

        该笔订单允许的最晚付款时间,逾期将关闭交易. 取值范围：1m～15d.m-分钟,h-小时,d-天,1c-当天 （1c-当天的情况下,无论交易何时创建,都在0点关闭）. 该参数数值不接受小数点, 如 1.5h,可转换为 90m. 注：若为空,则默认为15d.

        参数:
        timeoutExpress - timeoutExpress
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderTotalAmount

        public AppPayParamChain builderTotalAmount(String totalAmount)
        !!This Is An Indispensable Parameter Total Order Amount, Unit: Yuan, Accurate To Two Decimal Places, Value Range [0.01100000000]

        !!这是不可缺参数 订单总金额,单位为元,精确到小数点后两位,取值范围[0.01,100000000]

        参数:
        totalAmount - totalAmount
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderProductCode

        public AppPayParamChain builderProductCode(String productCode)
        !!This Is An Indispensable Parameter Product Code, The Product Code Signed By Merchants And AliPay Is Fixed Value QUICK_MSECURITY_PAY.

        !!这是不可缺参数 销售产品码,商家和支付宝签约的产品码,为固定值 QUICK_MSECURITY_PAY

        参数:
        productCode - productCode
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderGoodsType

        public AppPayParamChain builderGoodsType(String goodsType)
        Commodity Main Type: 0 - Virtual Commodity; 1 - Physical Commodity Note: The Use Of Huabei Channel Is Not Supported For Virtual Goods

        商品主类型：0—虚拟类商品:1—实物类商品 注：虚拟类商品不支持使用花呗渠道

        参数:
        goodsType - goodsType
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderPassBackParams

        public AppPayParamChain builderPassBackParams(String passBackParams)
        Public Return Parameter. If The Parameter Is Passed At The Time Of Request, It Will Be Returned To The Merchant. AliPay Will Return The Original Parameter In Asynchronous Notification. This Parameter Must Be UrlEncode Before It Can Be Sent To AliPay.

        公用回传参数,如果请求时传递了该参数,则返回给商户时会回传该参数. 支付宝会在异步通知时将该参数原样返回.本参数必须进行 UrlEncode 之后才可以发送给支付宝

        参数:
        passBackParams - passBackParams
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderPromoParams

        public AppPayParamChain builderPromoParams(String promoParams)
        Preferential Parameters Note: Only After Consultation With AliPay.

        优惠参数 注：仅与支付宝协商后可用

        参数:
        promoParams - promoParams
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderExtendParams

        public AppPayParamChain builderExtendParams(com.alipay.api.domain.ExtendParams extendParams)
        Business Extension Parameters ,Document Address https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        业务扩展参数,文档地址 https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        参数:
        extendParams - extendParams
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderEnablePayChannels

        public AppPayParamChain builderEnablePayChannels(String enablePayChannels)
        Available Channels, Users Can Only Pay Within The Specified Channels Use "," To Separate When There Are Multiple Channels Note: mutually exclusive with DisablePayChannels, Document Address https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        可用渠道,用户只能在指定渠道范围内支付 当有多个渠道时用“,”分隔 注：与 DisablePayChannels 互斥, 文档地址 https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        参数:
        enablePayChannels - enablePayChannels
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderDisablePayChannels

        public AppPayParamChain builderDisablePayChannels(String disablePayChannels)
        Disable Channel, User Can't Pay Through Specified Channel Use "," to Separate When There Are Multiple Channels Note: Mutually Exclusive With EnablePayChannels, Document Address https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        禁用渠道,用户不可用指定渠道支付 当有多个渠道时用“,”分隔 注：与 EnablePayChannels 互斥, 文档地址 https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/

        参数:
        disablePayChannels - disablePayChannels
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderStoreId

        public AppPayParamChain builderStoreId(String storeId)
        Merchant Store Number. This Parameter Is Used In The Request Parameter To Distinguish Stores, Not Required 商户门店编号.该参数用于请求参数中以区分各门店,非必传项
        参数:
        storeId - storeId
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain

      • builderExtUserInfo

        public AppPayParamChain builderExtUserInfo(com.alipay.api.domain.ExtUserInfo extUserInfo)
        External Designated Buyer, Document Address https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/ 外部指定买家,文档地址 https://docs.open.alipay.com/204/105465/
        参数:
        extUserInfo - extUserInfo
        返回:
        AppPayParamChain
